"Beautiful" (stylized as "#Beautiful") is a song recorded by American singer-songwriters Mariah Carey and Miguel. It was released as the lead single from Carey's upcoming fourteenth studio album The Art of Letting Go (2013). The song was written and produced by Carey and Miguel, alongside Nathan Perez and Brooke Davis; Perez also aided in producing the song. Released on May 6, 2013, Carey and Miguel did not reveal that they had collaborated on the song, until April 25, 2013, when Carey revealed the title in a 25 second teaser video during season twelve of American Idol. It was also on Idol, on May 9, that Carey premiered the official music video for "Beautiful", before uploading an alternative edit to her VEVO account, that is set to the explicit version of the song.
